title: Does airplane mode avoid phone charges? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, but only because in airplane mode,it is impossible to make or receive calls, use the messaging services or connect to the internet or web via the phone’sown connection, wifi or bluetooth. Airplane mode turns all the RF parts of the phone off, so what you have in your hand is a non-networked computer which will let you play some games, watch video you have stored on it, or listen to stored music.

Of course it does – airplane mode turns off your cellular radio and disconnects you from your carrier’s network, so there is no usage to charge you for. You are still on the hook for your regular monthly charges, however, so I hope you weren't thinking you were being creative and avoiding that.
